snippet: Madison Gate Records, a little-known unit of Sony Pictures, signed Pentatonix after the five-member group won the television talent show “The Sing-Off.”
abstract: Media Decoder blog; Madison Gate Records, little-known unit of Sony Pictures, signs a cappella group Pentatonix after five-member group won television talent show The Sing-Off.
lead_paragraph: Madison Gate Records, a little-known unit of Sony Pictures, signed Pentatonix after the five-member group won the television talent show “The Sing-Off.”

headline.main: A Tiny Label Is Behind an a Cappella Group’s Success
headline.print_headline: A Tiny Label Is Behind An A Cappella Group’s Success
